title: Sarah Hyland asks Vanessa Hudgens to be her bridesmaid... after making a trip to the ER
text:
Sarah Hyland's wedding to Bachelorette star Wells Adams is inching closer and closer.

Adams proposed to the Modern Family actress in July while vacationing in Fiji, after two years of dating.

Now, Hyland has made another big announcement, asking her pal Vanessa Hudgens to serve as a bridesmaid.

Going to the chapel: Wells Adams proposed to Sarah Hyland in July while vacationing in Fiji, after two years of dating and now Sarah is in full wedding planning mode

Hudgens, 30, took to her Instagram story Sunday with a photo of a wooden gift box wrapped in white ribbon and garnished with a leaf, which the bride-to-be sent her.

The snap was adorned with kissy face emojis and the word 'bridesmaid,' also tagging Hyland, 28, who shared it to her story as well.

Hyland and Hudgens have been friends for years, running in the same squad as Ashley Tisdale and Kim Hidalgo.

The happy news comes after Hyland spent Sunday with her fiancé, 35, in the emergency room.

Bridesmaid vibes: Hyland made a big announcement as she's asked her pal Vanessa Hudgens to serve as a bridesmaid

Squad goals: Hyland and Hudgens have been friends for years, running in the same squad as Ashley Tisdale and Kim Hidalgo

I do: Hudgens took to her Instagram story Sunday with a photo of a wooden gift box wrapped in white ribbon and garnished with a leaf, which the bride-to-be sent her

She posted a black-and-white selfie to her story from the hospital bed, captioned: 'ER but make it fashion.'

The couple also goofed around with a filter, which gave them big lips and put pink dollar signs on their faces, joking that they're 'Instagram models' now.

They both seemed in good spirits as they dealt with another trip to the hospital in only a few months.

In June, she spent several days in the hospital with a 'mystery condition' that made it difficult to breathe.

Hospitalized: The happy news comes after Hyland spent Sunday with her fiancé, 35, in the emergency room

Serving face: The couple goofed around with an Insta filter, which gave them big lips and put pink dollar signs on their faces, joking that they're 'Instagram models' now

Good spirits: They both seemed in good spirits as they dealt with another trip to the hospital in only a few months

But she still made time to record a video for a friend's birthday of herself dancing while hooked up to machines.

She also suffers from a chronic kidney condition, having received a transplant from her father Edward in 2012.

After complications with the kidney, she underwent another transplant from her brother Ian in 2017.

Hyland revealed to People that she and Adams bonded over her hospitalization: 'I had all these health issues at the very beginning of our relationship, and then I was on massive amounts of painkillers in the hospital FaceTiming him at all hours of the day and night. He still liked me after that!'
